titles.title: To establish a FinTech Council to designate a single primary regulator of eligible FinTech startups, to create the Offices of Financial Innovation, and for other purposes.
Facilitating Innovation and New Technology so Entrepreneurs Create and Hire Act of 2019
Facilitating Innovation and New Technology so Entrepreneurs Create and Hire Act of 2019
FINTECH Act of 2019
FINTECH Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit.
